MenuTopicSubItemclass

menusys.t[459]

Property
Summary

Summary

Property
Details

Method
Details

A menu topic sub-item can be used to represent an item in a MenuTopicItem's list of display items. This can be useful when displaying a topic must trigger a side-effect. `class `**`MenuTopicSubItem`**` :   object`

Superclass Tree   (in declaration order)

MenuTopicSubItem
`         object`

Summary of Methods  

` [getItemText](#getItemText)  `

Properties  

(none)

Methods  

getItemText ( )

menusys.t[465]

Get the item's text. By default, we just return an empty string. This should be overridden to return the appropriate text, and can also trigger any desired side-effects.
